snippet.title: Hyde's Haunt & Seek - Official Gameplay Trailer | Ghouls 4 Games
snippet.description: Check out gameplay from Hyde's Haunt & Seek in this new trailer for the upcoming multiplayer horror game. Spook or be spooked in this ghostly multiplayer horror game! Play as the mortal Seeker, hunting prized possessions of the dead, or as Ghosts, using pranks and scares to keep those pesky humans from your prize. It's multiplayer mayhem as ghouls clash with go-getters in a haunted manor! Hyde's Haunt & Seek will be available on PC.
